mapper.select:
SELECT food_no, food_name, energy, carb, protein, fat, sodium FROM FOOD JOIN FOOD_CODE USING (food_code) JOIN NUTRIENT USING (nutrient_no)
( food_name LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR rep_food_name LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' )
AND
food_code = #{foodCode}
ORDER BY food_name

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.meal_no, m.meal_id, f.food_no, f.food_name, n.energy, n.carb, n.protein, n.fat, n.sodium, m.quantity FROM MEAL_PLAN m JOIN FOOD f ON m.ref_no = f.food_no JOIN NUTRIENT n ON f.nutrient_no = n.nutrient_no WHERE m.user_no = #{userNo} AND TRUNC(m.meal_date) = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND m.meal_type = 'FOOD'
UNION ALL
SELECT m.meal_no, m.meal_id, r.rcp_no AS foodNo, r.rcp_name AS foodName, n.energy, n.carb, n.protein, n.fat, n.sodium, NULL AS quantity FROM MEAL_PLAN m JOIN RECIPE r ON m.ref_no = r.rcp_no JOIN NUTRIENT n ON r.nutrient_no = n.nutrient_no WHERE m.user_no = #{userNo} AND TRUNC(m.meal_date) = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND m.meal_type = 'RCP' ) t ORDER BY meal_no

SELECT mealDate, SUM(energy) AS energy, SUM(carbs) AS carbs, SUM(protein) AS protein, SUM(fat) AS fat, SUM(sodium) AS sodium FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(m.meal_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS mealDate, n.energy * m.quantity / 100 AS energy, n.carb * m.quantity / 100 AS carbs, n.protein * m.quantity / 100 AS protein, n.fat * m.quantity / 100 AS fat, n.sodium * m.quantity / 100 AS sodium FROM MEAL_PLAN m JOIN FOOD f ON m.ref_no = f.food_no JOIN NUTRIENT n ON f.nutrient_no = n.nutrient_no WHERE m.user_no = #{userNo} AND TRUNC(m.meal_date) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND m.meal_type = 'FOOD'
UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(m.meal_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS mealDate, n.energy AS energy, n.carb AS carbs, n.protein AS protein, n.fat AS fat, n.sodium AS sodium FROM MEAL_PLAN m JOIN RECIPE r ON m.ref_no = r.rcp_no JOIN NUTRIENT n ON r.nutrient_no = n.nutrient_no WHERE m.user_no = #{userNo} AND TRUNC(m.meal_date) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND m.meal_type = 'RCP' ) GROUP BY mealDate ORDER BY mealDate

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.* FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.meal_no, m.meal_id, m.meal_type, m.ref_no, f.food_no AS foodNo, f.food_name AS foodName, n.energy, n.carb, n.protein, n.fat, n.sodium, m.quantity, m.meal_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY m.meal_type, m.ref_no ORDER BY m.meal_date DESC, m.meal_no DESC ) AS rn FROM MEAL_PLAN m JOIN FOOD f ON m.ref_no = f.food_no JOIN NUTRIENT n ON f.nutrient_no = n.nutrient_no WHERE m.user_no = 4 AND m.meal_type = 'FOOD' ) WHERE rn = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.meal_no, m.meal_id, m.meal_type, m.ref_no, r.rcp_no AS foodNo, r.rcp_name AS foodName, n.energy, n.carb, n.protein, n.fat, n.sodium, m.quantity, m.meal_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY m.meal_type, m.ref_no ORDER BY m.meal_date DESC, m.meal_no DESC ) AS rn FROM MEAL_PLAN m JOIN RECIPE r ON m.ref_no = r.rcp_no JOIN NUTRIENT n ON r.nutrient_no = n.nutrient_no WHERE m.user_no = 4 AND m.meal_type = 'RCP' ) WHERE rn = 1 ) t ORDER BY t.meal_date DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
